metadata.title: Second Inaugural Address of Donald J. Trump (analyzed by ChatGPT)
metadata.summary: Trump's address centers on national rebirth through strength, sovereignty, and order. Strong nationalist and control-oriented framing is reinforced by anti-globalist rhetoric, traditional social norms, and critiques of elite institutions. Emphasizes economic competition, military strength, and cultural cohesion while rejecting progressive change, cosmopolitanism, and egalitarianism.
